title: Wake Word Detection
description: Hybrid CNN-BiLSTM engine with INT8 Quantization (293KB) on Raspberry Pi 5. Achieved 7.47ms latency and >95% F1-score.

title: Automotive ECU Simulator
description: Real-time ECU-Dashboard simulator on STM32F4 using FreeRTOS. Developed optimized Bare-metal drivers (MCAL) for CAN 2.0 & I2C.

title: Smart Home IoT
description: Smart Home System using ESP32 & MQTT for real-time control via Web Dashboard.

title: Auto Temp Control
description: Standalone STM32 System (HAL) using PWM & ADC to dynamically regulate fan speed based on temperature.
